issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Create test utils module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6487](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6487). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I've been learning how to better organize unit test code in Rust and would like to introduce a test utils module containing common test helper functions. This code will use `#[cfg(test)]` to make sure it doesn't ship with the production code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6487?focusedCommentId=16925300) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5323
